articles.author: Nino Paoli
articles.title: Silicon Valley tech boss Marc Benioff says he's all for Trump sending troops to San Francisco since 'we don't have enough cops' - Fortune
articles.description: “We don’t have enough cops, so if they can be cops, I’m all for it,” Benioff told The New York Times on Friday.
articles.content: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff says Americas tech capital has a police problem, and hes welcoming President Donald Trumps pitch to send National Guard troops to yet another Democrat-led city.We dont hav… [+2753 chars]

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: iPhone 17 Pro Max review: Orange you glad the battery is bigger - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple’s iPhone 17 Pro lineup adds a sturdier unibody design, bigger battery, and camera upgrades, trading thinness for power, endurance, and creator appeal.
articles.content: When Apple announced its thin and light iPhone Air, some people said, “Who asked for a thinner phone?” Moments later, the company went in the other direction and announced a slightly thicker and bulk… [+6973 chars]
